battleTactics.name: Raze
battleTactics.description: The enemy's fortifications crumble before your relentless assault. Leave nothing standing in your wake.
battleTactics.requirement: Destroy a unit with 5 or more models

command.name: Coordinated Strike
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit within 3" of another friendly unit
command.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by the picked unit until the end of the phase

battleTactics.name: Dominion
battleTactics.description: Your forces establish control over the battlefield, claiming territory and strategic positions.
battleTactics.requirement: Score 3 or more victory points from objectives

command.name: Hold the Line
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit wholly within 6" of an objective
command.effect: That unit counts as 2 models for the purposes of contesting that objective until the end of the turn

battleTactics.name: Overwhelm
battleTactics.description: A coordinated assault crashes into the enemy lines like a tidal wave, overwhelming their defenses.
battleTactics.requirement: Charge with 3 or more units in the same turn

command.name: Swift Advance
command.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for the picked units until the end of the phase

battleTactics.name: Precision
battleTactics.description: A surgical strike executed with deadly accuracy. Quality over quantity proves decisive.
battleTactics.requirement: Destroy an enemy unit with a unit that has 3 or fewer models

command.name: Precision Strike
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit with 3 or fewer models
command.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by the picked unit until the end of the phase

battleTactics.name: Supremacy
battleTactics.description: Your forces dominate the battlefield, holding multiple strategic positions simultaneously.
battleTactics.requirement: Control 4 or more objectives at the end of your turn

command.name: Territorial Control
command.effect: That unit can run and still charge later in the turn

battleTactics.name: Swarm
battleTactics.description: The weight of numbers overwhelms even the mightiest foe. Your horde strikes with coordinated fury.
battleTactics.requirement: Destroy an enemy unit with a unit that has a wounds characteristic of 1

command.name: Overwhelm
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit with a wounds characteristic of 1
command.effect: Add 1 to the attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by the picked unit until the end of the phase

battleTactics.name: Invasion
battleTactics.description: Your forces penetrate deep into enemy territory, establishing footholds behind their lines.
battleTactics.requirement: Score 2 or more victory points from objectives in your opponent's territory

command.name: Deep Strike
command.effect: That unit can move an extra 3" when it makes a normal move

battleTactics.name: Titan Slayer
battleTactics.description: Your mighty warriors bring down the enemy's greatest champions, proving their supremacy in single combat.
battleTactics.requirement: Destroy an enemy unit with a unit that has a wounds characteristic of 4 or more

command.name: Titan's Might
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit with a wounds characteristic of 4 or more
command.effect: Add 1 to the damage characteristic of melee weapons used by the picked unit until the end of the phase

battleTactics.name: Conquest
battleTactics.description: Your forces establish a permanent presence in enemy territory, claiming their lands as your own.
battleTactics.requirement: Control 3 or more objectives in your opponent's territory

command.name: Invasion
command.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly units wholly within your opponent's territory
command.effect: Each picked unit counts as 2 models for the purposes of contesting objectives until the end of the turn

battleTactics.name: Elite Hunters
battleTactics.description: Your veteran warriors prove their worth, bringing down formidable foes through skill and experience.
battleTactics.requirement: Destroy an enemy unit with a unit that has a wounds characteristic of 2 or 3

command.name: Elite Strike
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit with a wounds characteristic of 2 or 3
command.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by the picked unit until the end of the phase

battleTactics.name: Total Control
battleTactics.description: Your strategic mastery is complete. Every objective falls under your banner.
battleTactics.requirement: Score 4 or more victory points from objectives

command.name: Dominion
command.effect: Each picked unit counts as 2 models for the purposes of contesting objectives until the end of the turn

battleTactics.name: Monster Slayer
battleTactics.description: Your greatest champions face the enemy's mightiest beasts and emerge victorious.
battleTactics.requirement: Destroy an enemy unit with a unit that has a wounds characteristic of 5 or more

command.name: Colossal Fury
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit with a wounds characteristic of 5 or more
command.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls, 1 to wound rolls, and 1 to the damage characteristic of melee weapons used by the picked unit until the end of the phase
